Health Data Research Network (HDRN) workshops are a forum space to advance and promote best and standardised practices in data access, handling, security, analysis and public engagement. Our network is open to universities, governmental bodies, national research initiatives, health professionals, and industry.

Venue: Engineers House, Bristol BS8 3NB [///dent.beyond.bridge](https://what3words.com/dent.beyond.bridge)
